list_definition.definition: the study of events etc that happened in the past
a description usually in writing of past events, ways of life etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m writing a history of Scotland.

list_definition.definition: (the description of) the usually interesting events etc associated with (something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This desk/word has a very interesting history.
